title: Google\Cloud\VMMigration\V1\ComputeEngineTargetDefaults
name: ComputeEngineTargetDefaults
description:
ComputeEngineTargetDefaults is a collection of details for creating a VM in a target Compute Engine project.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.vmmigration.v1.ComputeEngineTargetDefaults

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.vm_name
params.description: The name of the VM to create.

params.name: data.target_project
params.description: The full path of the resource of type TargetProject which represents the Compute Engine project in which to create this VM.

params.name: data.zone
params.description: The zone in which to create the VM.

params.name: data.machine_type_series
params.description: The machine type series to create the VM with.

params.name: data.machine_type
params.description: The machine type to create the VM with.

params.name: data.network_tags
params.description: A map of network tags to associate with the VM.

params.name: data.network_interfaces
params.description: List of NICs connected to this VM.

params.name: data.service_account
params.description: The service account to associate the VM with.

params.name: data.disk_type
params.description: The disk type to use in the VM.

params.name: data.labels
params.description: A map of labels to associate with the VM.

params.name: data.license_type
params.description: The license type to use in OS adaptation.

params.name: data.applied_license
params.description: Output only. The OS license returned from the adaptation module report.

params.name: data.compute_scheduling
params.description: Compute instance scheduling information (if empty default is used).

params.name: data.secure_boot
params.description: Defines whether the instance has Secure Boot enabled. This can be set to true only if the vm boot option is EFI.

params.name: data.boot_option
params.description: Output only. The VM Boot Option, as set in the source vm.

params.name: data.metadata
params.description: The metadata key/value pairs to assign to the VM.

params.name: data.additional_licenses
params.description: Additional licenses to assign to the VM.

params.name: data.hostname
params.description: The hostname to assign to the VM.
